mapper.update: update product set pro_name = #{pro_name}, pro_category = #{pro_category}, pro_stock = #{pro_stock}, pro_price = #{pro_price} where pro_code = #{pro_code}
mapper.insert: insert into product( pro_name, pro_stono, pro_category, pro_stock, pro_price) values( #{pro_name}, #{pro_stono}, #{pro_category}, #{pro_stock}, #{pro_price})
mapper.select: select m.mem_no as mem_no, m.sto_name as sto_name, m.mem_address as mem_address, p.pro_name as pro_name, p.pro_stock as pro_stock, m.sto_img as sto_img from member m, product p where m.mem_no=p.pro_memno and p.pro_name like concat('%', #{search}, '%') or m.sto_name like concat('%', #{search}, '%') order by p.pro_name, m.sto_name limit #{beginList}, 10
select * from product where pro_memno = #{mem_no} order by pro_name
select * from product where pro_memno = #{mem_no} and pro_name like concat('%', #{productSearch}, '%') order by pro_name
select count(*) from member m, product p where m.mem_no=p.pro_memno and p.pro_name like concat('%', #{search}, '%') or m.sto_name like concat('%', #{search}, '%')
